text: @HillaryClinton Will do! I feel sorry for Joe Biden he will inherit a disaster! Biden be able to repair the disaster the Trump Adm. has created! Trump has said "Obama Adm. left him with broken tests". Hello the Obama Adm. didn't have Covid-19 test needed now. It's Trump Adm. with broken tests!
